events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I would like to request a refund as it doesn’t fit properly and feels quite uncomfortable.
The customer issue is categorized under Refund due to a request for money back because of an unfitting jacket.
Agent Sarah was assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket, ensuring the case is addressed promptly.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your jacket. I’ll be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for a smooth refund?
The order number is 34219876. Yes, the jacket is brand new, still with tags attached and in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. I have now processed your refund request and sent you a prepaid return label by email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be issued within 5 business days.
Great, thank you for the quick help and clear instructions. I will send back the jacket today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the full refund. The amount should reflect on your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
As no further inquiries were received, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for shopping with us and we hope to serve you again soon.
